SKT_FIRST.name: Magician's Choice
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and increases <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Evasion</color>.

SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: レジーナワールド+1回\nダメージUP

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Resets The Show Must Go On Cooldown\nExtra Turn
SKT_BURST_3.effect_kr: 쇼 머스트 고 온 쿨타임 초기화\n추가 턴
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp:
【ショー・マスト・
ゴーオン】のスキル
ターン初期化
追加ターン

description: Attacks an enemy and increases <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000067_1_1]</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Evasion</color>.
SKT_FIRST.name_jp: マジシャンズセレクト
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> 증가시킵니다.\n이 스킬은 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>회피</color>가 높을수록 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、自分の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>UPさせる。\nこのスキルは自分の<color=#28d9ed>回避</color>が高いほどダメージがUPする。

SKT_SECOND.name: It's Checkmate!
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Passive Effect) Grants <color=#28d9ed>1 stack(s)</color> of <color=#28d9ed>Regina's World</color> at the start of battle. Decreases the stack count of Regina's World when hit.\n(Triggered Effect) When evading an enemy's attack, reduces the cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>The Show Must Go On</color> by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. Counterattacks when attacked.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Evasion</color>.
description: (Passive Effect) Grants <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000067_2_5] stack(s)</color> of <color=#28d9ed>Reginaâs World</color> at the start of battle. Decreases the stack count of Regina's World when hit.\n(Triggered Effect) When evading an enemy's attack, reduces the cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>The Show Must Go On</color> by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000067_2_1] turn(s)</color>. Counterattacks when attacked.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Evasion</color>.

4: +1 turn Increased Evasion duration after counterattacking

SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: (패시브 효과) 전투 입장 시 <color=#28d9ed>레지나의 세계</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>1회</color> 발생시킵니다. 이 효과는 피격 시 횟수가 차감됩니다.\n(발동 효과) 적의 공격 회피 시 <color=#28d9ed>쇼 머스트 고 온</color>의 쿨타임이 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 감소합니다. 피격 시 대상에게 반격합니다.\n이 스킬은 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>회피</color>가 높을수록 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: (パッシブ効果)戦闘開始時、<color=#28d9ed>【レジーナワールド】</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1回</color>付与する。この効果はダメージを受けた時に回数が削られる。\n(発動効果)敵の攻撃を回避時、<color=#28d9ed>【ショー・マスト・ゴーオン】</color>のスキルターンが<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>減少する。ダメージを受けた時、対象に反撃する。\nこのスキルは自分の<color=#28d9ed>回避</color>が高いほどダメージがUPする。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: The Show Must Go On
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Removes all buffs from the target, and attacks an enemy. After attacking, grants <color=#28d9ed>1 stack(s)</color> of <color=#28d9ed>Regina's World</color>. Decreases the stack count of Regina's World when hit.\nIgnores <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> of the target's Defense, and increases damage dealt proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Evasion</color>. The buff removal effect ignores the target's Resilience.
description: Removes all buffs from the target, and attacks an enemy. After attacking, grants <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000067_3_4] stack(s)</color> of <color=#28d9ed>Reginaâs World</color>. Decreases the stack count of Regina's World when hit.\nIgnores <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> of the targetâs Defense, and increases damage dealt proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Evasion</color>. The buff removal effect ignores the target's Resilience.
SKT_ULTIMATE.name_jp: ショー・マスト・ゴーオン
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 대상의 강화 효과를 모두 해제하고 적을 공격합니다. 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>레지나의 세계</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>1회</color> 발생시킵니다. 이 효과는 피격 시 횟수가 차감됩니다.\n이 스킬은 대상의 방어력을 <color=#28d9ed>30%</color>무시하며, 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>회피</color>가 높을수록 피해가 증가합니다. 강화 해제 효과는 대상의 효과 저항을 무시합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 対象の強化効果をすべて解除し、敵単体にダメージを与える。攻撃後 <color=#28d9ed>【レジーナワールド】</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1回</color>発生させる。この効果はダメージを受けた時に回数が削られる。\nこのスキルは対象の防御力を<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>無視し、自分の<color=#28d9ed>回避</color>が高いほどダメージがUPする。強化効果の解除効果は対象の効果抵抗を無視する。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to increase Attack of all allies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, increases <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>30%</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000067_chain_1_1]</color> chance to increase Attack of all allies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000067_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, increases <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000067_backup_1_1]</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 피니시 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>의 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 아군 전체의 공격력이 증가합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> 증가시킵니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(トドメ)</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で味方全体の攻撃力を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPさせる。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、自分の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>UPさせる。
